title: Moroccan chicken with fruity couscous and spiced yoghurt dip
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets', '2 teaspoons Moroccan spice mix', '2 teaspoons plain flour', 'oil for frying', 'For the couscous', '200ml apple juice', '200g couscous', '4 dried apricots, chopped', '1 handful sultanas', '1/2 small red onion, sliced thinly', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 handful pistachio or almonds, roughly chopped', 'Yogurt dip', '100g natural or Greek style yoghurt', '1 teaspoon Moroccan spice mix', '1 dash honey', 'fresh or dried mint (optional)']
